Bitcoin Market Trends.title: Bitcoin at $84,320 with +2.5% Weekly Change
Bitcoin Market Trends.summary: Current market cap is $1.64 trillion with 24-hour volume of $42.8 billion. Bitcoin dominance is at 56.8%.

Price Analysis.title: Technical Analysis: RSI at 64.2 with Bullish MACD
Price Analysis.summary: Support levels at $79,500, $77,800, $75,200. Resistance at $86,500, $90,000, $100,000. Trading above all major MAs.

Institutional Developments.title: Institutional Adoption Accelerates
Institutional Developments.summary: Major financial institutions including Fidelity and BlackRock continue to increase their Bitcoin holdings, with an estimated $2.3 billion in new institutional investments this week.

Institutional Developments.title: SEC Bitcoin ETF Decision Pending
Institutional Developments.summary: The SEC is expected to announce decisions on several Bitcoin ETF applications in the coming weeks, potentially opening the door to greater mainstream investment.

Regulatory Updates.title: United States: Treasury Department clarifies reporting requirements for cryptocurrency transactions above $10,000.
European Union: EU MiCA regulations implementation timeline announced, with full compliance required by Q2 2025.

Technology Advancements.title: Lightning Network Capacity Hits New High
Technology Advancements.summary: Bitcoin's Layer 2 scaling solution, the Lightning Network, has reached a new all-time high of 5,000+ BTC capacity, improving Bitcoin's viability for everyday transactions.

Research Insights.title: Current Bitcoin Research Insights
Research Insights.summary: Short-term outlook: Bullish, with potential volatility around ETF decisions. Mid-term projections: Strong upward momentum expected to continue through Q3.
Research Insights.description_md:
## Key Risks

- Regulatory uncertainty in key markets
- Macroeconomic headwinds affecting risk assets
- Technical resistance at psychological $100K level
